summary: A courier for a local crime lord must deliver a mysterious package while being chased by a horde of unusual gangsters.
cast: Steve Austin|Dolph Lundgren|Eric Keenleyside|Mike Dopud|John Novak|Kristen Kerr|Darren Shahlavi|Paul Wu|Lochlyn Munro|Mark Gibbon|Peter Bryant|Monique Ganderton|Michael Daingerfield|Jerry Trimble|Patrick Sabongui|Lindsay Bourne|William B. Davis|John Hainsworth|Terese Cilluffo|Tim Henry|Kim Kondrashoff|Richard Faraci|Luisa d'Oliveira|Ed Anders|Todd Scott|Phillip Mitchell|Rick Pearce|Cody Laudan|Kory Grim|Lars Grant|Chad Bellamy|Scott J. Ateah|Richard Bradshaw|Brent Connolly|Tony Morelli|Ernie Jackson|Jeffrey C. Robinson|Krzysztof Soszynski|Heath Stevenson|Jimmy Townsend
title: Entrega peligrosa
